item.title: Web Dialer, click-to-call reloaded
item.description: Photo source: Interactive Powers. Make calls from any Web Browser. From now, phone numbers are no longer required. In todayâ€™s increasingly digital world, customers have come to favor online service options available from the convenience of their screen. From chatbots and self-service features to digitally connecting to a live agent with a simple button click, companies aim to deliver a digital customer experience that is personal, seamless, quick, and efficient.
